data.content:
This game used to be incredibly entertaining and actually to most new players it will still be. I believe there is probably a good years worth of playability of it.

However, to make it playable within that year you'll have to spend some cash. £100 should do it. If you spend any less - it will be sluggishly boring and slow, much as it has become for me now.

After reaching town hall 9 the will to continue playing is almost non existent. Wall upgrades cost 500k gold each and it's just soul destroying to upgrade them any further. The gameplay is boring and repetitive and the reward for the hard grind is completely unappealing. I do not have the money to throw into the game to make it fun again, as that would likey be several thousands of pounds to progress.

What a shame.
data.title: A once very fun game, now hideously boring.

data.content: Great game been playing for about 2years (strong th9) just a few issues, there are too many non English speaking players on the English global which is irritating dunno how u can fix it but whatever. Also the upgrade times for buildings troops heroes is too high once you get better so these should be redused. When u upgrade heroes to level 15+ the regen time should NOT be around 20Mins! That is way too high. You should also be allowed to do personal chats with people on ur friends list so you can talk with them without being in the same clan. You should be able to swap loot for gems/loot with people in global/your clan/friends to help you out, and the option to restart your account for all those rushers or people who want to restart. You should be able to copy bases without having to make them or look on YouTube  as this takes far too long and is annoying . Yeah that's all but pretty solid game Congrats. Y'all probs ain't gonna read this or even look at it but pleare take this into Consideration as we are the ones who have paid for your fancy cars and 'dinners'with people who don't like you.

data.content: Great mobile game ruined by one simply flaw. The fact that even the lowest clan members can be given mega high level troops and defend against any attackers. If you ever get even moderately invested in this game you'll come across this utter bull mechanic. Bases worth like 5-15 trophies wipe anyone that attacks them due to this crud. Either the troops donated should only be the level the player they're donated to or the trophy count should be adjusted to take this into account. I've been attacking people and massive troops come out of their clan base and wipe my entire army. It's game breaking. Sort it out.

Would still recommend as a game to play every now and then.

data.content:
This game is by far one of the best on App Store, but I feel the developers don't add in enough social features yet focus a lot on new buildings and heroes for higher level players.

It would be nice if the developers could add the option to message other people in the game, maybe only if you've friended them (to prevent unnecessary abuse). Also, for clans it would be good if you could create a feature where you could write notes for the clan and save them like sticky notes, so when you open up the clan screen you can see what a leader or co-leader has written in a Notes section, as a better form of leading and a way of getting a message across to the clan when you're not online. Another great feature would be to customise clan titles to make the clan more personal, and to assign different permissions for each of those titles e.g Kick Members, Recruit, Initiate a Clan War Search, Send a Clan Mail or something like that. I feel like that there isn't a lot of things you can do as a leader of a clan which could easily be implemented by developers.

A final feature which could be put in is the option to be able to send a capped amount of resources to your allies. 

Thanks for taking the time to read this, I'll update this review with anything new that I think of.
data.title: Needs more Social Features

data.content: I personally love this game, me and my friends are obsessed! We love being involved in the wars but there is just one small problem. The clan seem to rely on the highest members to donate to all war bases and also to donate to each member when they use 2 attacks in every war. The problem with this is the top members are using a lot of elixir to train troops to make the war bases as strong as possible in defence. Therefore they aren't really gaining anything from each war, in most cases they are coming out with less elixir than what they started with. I think it would be a good idea if you could request elixir and coin donations from clan members as well as troops so that the highest members/main donators can request elixir to train the troops and this would mean the other clan members are contributing towards their own defences for war also. I hope this is taken into consideration, thank you for reading! The game is definitely one of the best app games out there!

data.content:
I have played this game a lot, 3 different Christmas trees so not as long as some. I have put effort and some money into it.

But what really gets up my wick is amount of changes they keep making, I want go into too much detail but I had a break from the game for about 3 months and deleted it off my phone back in April/May 2016 because of the update then.

Now just before Christmas not long after they updated it so 3millon walls became 2million walls, (it was literally like Christmas came early that one) I would get attacked like maybe once or twice a day or maybe 2 or 3 trophy droppers in one day. BUT NOW IN JUST 3 DAYS I HAVE HAD 40 TROPHY DROPPERS, WHATS GOING ON SUPERCEL, YOU HAVE MESSED IT UP AGAIN.

I'll give it until Friday, if it hasn't calmed down by then I'm deleting it and for good this time. Your pressure tactics to try and make me play more often won't work on me. 

So at this moment in time I'm giving you the finger to you, the latest update and your game.

data.content:
I do not think this is very good as it took me ages to actually update and then play with new version. It is an ok game overall, but that is why I am only rating it 2 stars.

I have contacted 'supercell' via my problems, and it took me 2 weeks to get a response, which is obviously really poor service. Hopefully they now know what to improve on to make there games and their company better.

Clash of clans is a fun game to play, but it also can be very frustrating and annoying to play. I enjoy fighting the other users, collecting taxes and doing overall things with my clan (TDM2 ( the one with 'flybear')), although I definitely do not enjoy the faults and errors of this game (First two paragraphs above).

I am sure other people have commented on the faults I have provided above. If you are having the same  problems, please join the clan TDM2 (the one with 'flybear'(Milan Gudka is me)).

I hope these comments / this review has been helpful to you so you know the faults, which hopefully 'supercell' will fix son as it is spoiling the game.

Hopefully supercell get to their customers comments / reviews in order to improve.

Thanks

data.content:
After downloading this game sometime in 2012-2013 I knew from the very off the game would be a real "keeper." 

In the past I have actually made purchases of up to £50 in this game's virtual store. This donation would not only contribute towards helping create a more enjoyable game but it would help me on my way to building up my Town Hall etc.

Although I soon hit a brick wall when earlier this week I could not access my built up TH 9 account. I then went straight to customer support in game and the feedback and guidance I received was honestly the best customer service I've ever received. My problem was resolved and back clashing I would soon be.

And better still, with the constant new updates and events been adding weekly, clash could not be in a better place right now.

So on behalf of a fellow, loyal clasher, thanks for making such an enjoyable strategy game which I hope will be enjoyed furthermore for years to come.

Cheers, Euan.

data.title: Upgrade loop

data.content:
After quitting for nearly a year after the Dec 15 update that very much upset the Clash world, they are back and I have to say it's better. 

I uninstalled this game but was told a few weeks ago it was better. I had played for 2 years. So downloaded and thankfully my account was still going. So I picked up from where I left off. 

I have to say well done for turning this around. I like the upgrades and the treasury keeping some loot safe. I like the get 5 stars to put more loot in there. It takes some of the pain away on upgrades. 

I'm pleased they fixed the take a break timer and also I like the new troop training section. 

I notice some people complaining there is no point in upgrading the barracks now. 

To explain that if you upgrade them the troops train quicker. And also you and swap around who gets trained first. I like that a lot. And the quick training.

Now it's fixed again please don't mess to much with it. 

5 stars again. I hope it stays that way.
data.title: They are back and to the best again.
